sections.name: Hero Section
sections.purpose: This prominent section captures immediate attention with captivating visuals and a concise value proposition, encouraging visitors to explore further.

sections.name: Trust Strip
sections.purpose: This section showcases trust signals like awards, certifications, or partner logos to instantly build credibility with new visitors.

sections.name: Signature Collection (Services)
sections.purpose: This section highlights key product lines or signature services, offering a glimpse into Ellora Furnishings' premium offerings.

sections.name: Why Choose Ellora
sections.purpose: This section articulates the unique selling propositions and benefits that differentiate Ellora Furnishings from competitors.

sections.name: Recent Installations
sections.purpose: This section displays a portfolio of recently completed projects, providing visual proof of quality work and inspiration for potential clients.

sections.name: How it works
sections.purpose: This section simplifies the client journey by outlining the step-by-step process of engaging with Ellora Furnishings' services.

sections.name: What our clients say (review testimonials)
sections.purpose: This section features authentic customer testimonials and reviews, building social proof and trust through positive experiences.

sections.name: Call to Action (CTA)
sections.purpose: This section provides a clear, compelling prompt to guide visitors towards a desired action, such as requesting a quote or booking a consultation.

sections.name: Contact Form
sections.purpose: This integrated form allows visitors to easily send inquiries directly from the homepage, streamlining communication.

sections.name: FAQ
sections.purpose: This section addresses common questions, providing immediate answers and reducing the need for direct customer support inquiries.

sections.name: Our Story
sections.purpose: This section shares the company's history, mission, and values, connecting with visitors on a personal level.

sections.name: Our Team
sections.purpose: This section introduces key team members, showcasing the expertise and people behind Ellora Furnishings.

sections.name: Our Values
sections.purpose: This section outlines the core principles and commitments that guide Ellora Furnishings' operations and customer interactions.

sections.name: Why Choose Us (Extended)
sections.purpose: This section elaborates on Ellora Furnishings' competitive advantages, quality standards, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

sections.name: Services Overview
sections.purpose: This section provides a comprehensive introduction to all the services offered by Ellora Furnishings.

sections.name: Zip Blinds
sections.purpose: This dedicated section details the features, benefits, and customization options for Ellora Furnishings' core zip blind products.

sections.name: Other Furnishings & Solutions
sections.purpose: This section showcases other product categories or furnishing services available, diversifying the offerings beyond zip blinds.

sections.name: Consultation & Installation Process
sections.purpose: This section explains the typical service process, from initial consultation to professional installation, setting client expectations.

sections.name: Service-Specific Portfolio
sections.purpose: This section displays a gallery of completed projects specific to the services offered, demonstrating expertise and quality.

sections.name: Contact Information
sections.purpose: This section provides essential contact details including phone numbers, email addresses, and physical location.

sections.name: Contact Form
sections.purpose: This form allows visitors to send detailed inquiries directly to Ellora Furnishings, ensuring all necessary information is captured efficiently.

sections.name: Location Map
sections.purpose: This interactive map helps clients easily find the physical showroom or office location.

sections.name: Business Hours
sections.purpose: This section clearly states the operating hours for customer inquiries and visits.
